Type Method# transform(dftSetup:inputReal:inputImaginary:outputReal:outputImaginary:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOSwatchOS 6.0+

```
static func transform<U, V>(
    dftSetup: OpaquePointer,
    inputReal: U,
    inputImaginary: U,
    outputReal: inout V,
    outputImaginary: inout V
) where U : AccelerateBuffer, V : AccelerateMutableBuffer, U.Element == Float, V.Element == Float
```

Deprecated

Use `vDSP.DiscreteFourierTransform`.
